page.title: 02MODERN NAILSWORTH
page.content: There are many things of interest in modern{Nailsworth,}such as the { {bicycle track }along which you will find all sorts of plants and creatures as you ride along. There are also a few streams for fishing. The{River {Frome}runs through the{Mortimer {Gardens.}If you like the{Countryside } there is alot to see. There are still a few{working mills.}There are art and craft galleries all exhibiting local work.The{Clock Tower}in {Nailsworth } is also of interest and it only chimes from 8am to 8pm. A well known landmark is the {'W'}in {Nailsworth,}a road which leads from { {Nailsworth}to {Minchinhampton}and is so called because of its sharp turns. {Nailsworth}has many peaceful areas for people to go and see nature. {Cossack Square }is a little square full of interesting things.
